definition: heavy drinking/to get drunk/to drink to excess
drunken fighting/to get drunk and quarrel

sentences.english: The star boozed frequently in his younger days.
sentences.chinese: 该明星在年轻时经常酗酒。

sentences.english: Being drunk or high can impact teens’ judgment and decision making skills.
sentences.chinese: 酗酒或吸毒会影响青少年的判断能力和做决定的技能。

sentences.english: From now on days of A letter is whole excessive drinking, abandonment.
sentences.chinese: 从此阿信整日酗酒，自暴自弃。

sentences.english: Motor vehicle fatalities were the most common form of alcohol-related deaths.
sentences.chinese: 酗酒后最常导致的恶果就是交通事故引起的死亡。

sentences.english: And what the hell did you mean by that remark about alcoholism?
sentences.chinese: 你说的那句关于酗酒的话，是什么意思？

sentences.english: The suspect who fled was arrested on suspicion of being drunk in public and resisting arrest.
sentences.chinese: 逃走的那名嫌犯因涉嫌公然酗酒及拒捕而遭到逮捕。

sentences.english: Alcoholics get special treatment making them throw up every time they drink alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 酗酒者得到特殊的治疗让他们每次在喝酒后呕吐。

sentences.english: Their refusal to remove the public-house will put a premium on drinking in the district.
sentences.chinese: 他们拒绝迁走那家酒店，这将助长该地区的酗酒风气。

sentences.english: And no association between accepting the label "alcoholic" and quitting drinking has been found.
sentences.chinese: 而且并未发现接受酗酒者的标签与戒酒有任何联系。

sentences.english: Drunken youths hang around outside looking for trouble.
sentences.chinese: 喝醉的年轻人在街头游荡，酗酒滋事。

sentences.english: He was degraded for being drunk.
sentences.chinese: 他因酗酒而受到降级处分。

sentences.english: The drunken little costdrawer and his brother, the cornet player.
sentences.chinese: 酗酒的小成本会计师和他那吹短号的兄弟。

sentences.english: He takes a hard line on under-age drinking.
sentences.chinese: 他对未到法定年龄的酗酒者采取强硬政策。

sentences.english: Drinking a Little comforts a day, but being used to hitting the bottle will paralyse all your senses.
sentences.chinese: 小酒宜情，但是酗酒成性会麻痹你所有的心智。

sentences.english: Overindulging in alcohol will do damage to your liver as well as your brain.
sentences.chinese: 酗酒会对你的肝脏以及大脑造成伤害。

sentences.english: I went through alcoholism treatment with Rielly.
sentences.chinese: 我和里利一起，肩并肩，终于挺过了酗酒治疗。

definition: to love wine as one's life (idiom); fond of the bottle
to give up drinking/to abstain from drinking
to fall into bad company/to make acquaintances indiscriminately
